forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low around 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
